  • Constructor Details

    • ParticleArrays

      public ParticleArrays(double[] aR_x, double[] aR_y, double[] aR_z, double[] aV_x, double[] aV_y, double[] aV_z, String[] aParticleTokens, String[] aMoleculeNamesOfParticles, int[] aParticleTypeIndices, int[] aMoleculeTypeIndices, int[] aMoleculeIndices, double[] aCharges, double[] aDpdMasses, double[] aMolarMasses, LinkedList<HarmonicBondChunkArrays> aBondChunkArraysList, int[] aChargedParticleIndices, boolean[] anIsNearestNeighborBaseParticleDeterminations, double[] aNearestNeighborDistances, int[] aNearestNeighborParticleIndices)
      Constructor (No checks are performed)
      Parameters:
      aR_x - Current x-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aR_y - Current y-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aR_z - Current z-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aV_x - Current x-components of particle velocities
      aV_y - Current y-components of particle velocities
      aV_z - Current z-components of particle velocities
      aParticleTokens - Tokens of particles (e.g. "H2O")
      aMoleculeNamesOfParticles - Molecule names of particles
      aParticleTypeIndices - Indices of particle type
      aMoleculeTypeIndices - Indices of molecule type
      aMoleculeIndices - Indices of molecules
      aCharges - Charges of particles
      aDpdMasses - DPD masses of particles
      aMolarMasses - Molar masses of particles
      aBondChunkArraysList - List of bond chunk arrays (may be null)
      aChargedParticleIndices - Charged particle indices (may be null)
      anIsNearestNeighborBaseParticleDeterminations - True: Nearest-neighbor for base particle is to be determined, false: Otherwise (may be null)
      aNearestNeighborDistances - Distances to nearest (non-bonded) neighbor particles (of another molecule) (may be null)
      aNearestNeighborParticleIndices - Indices of nearest (non-bonded) neighbor particles (of another molecule) (may be null)

      public boolean[] isNearestNeighborBaseParticleDeterminations()
      True: Nearest-neighbor for base particle is to be determined, false: Otherwise
      Returns:
      True: Nearest-neighbor for base particle is to be determined, false: Otherwise, or null if none exist

      public double[] getNearestNeighborDistances()

      Returns:

      Indices of nearest (non-bonded) neighbor particles (of another molecule) or null if none exist
